question: Find the work done by F = yi + xj along the straight line from (0,0) to (1,1)
Find the work done by F = 2i + 3j along the parabola y = x² from (0,0) to (1,1)
Find the work done by F = -yi + xj along the unit circle r(t) = (cos(t))i + (sin(t))j for one full revolution
Find the work done by F = xi + yj along the line segment from (1,2) to (3,4)
Find the work done by F = (x+y)i + (x-y)j along the curve y = x³ from (0,0) to (1,1)
Find the work done by F = y²i + x²j along the semicircle r(t) = (cos(t))i + (sin(t))j from (1,0) to (-1,0)
Find the work done by F = zi + xj + yk along the helix r(t) = (cos(t))i + (sin(t))j + tk
Find the work done by F = 3x²i + 2yj along the cubic path y = x³ from (0,0) to (2,8)
Find the work done by F = eˣi + sin(y)j along the line y = x from (0,0) to (π,π)
Find the work done by F = (x²-y²)i + (x²+y²)j along the boundary of the unit square (0,0)→(1,0)→(1,1)→(0,1)→(0,0)
curve: Piecewise linear path around unit square
